org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.core
Interface IBufferFactory

Deprecated. Use WorkingCopyOwner instead Provisional API: This class/interface is part of an interim API that is still under development and expected to change significantly before reaching stability. It is being made available at this early stage to solicit feedback from pioneering adopters on the understanding that any code that uses this API will almost certainly be broken (repeatedly) as the API evolves. 

public interface IBufferFactory

A factory that creates IBuffers for openables.

This interface may be implemented by clients.

Method Summary
 IBuffer createBuffer(IOpenable owner)
          Deprecated. Creates a buffer for the given owner.
 

Method Detail

createBuffer

IBuffer createBuffer(IOpenable owner)
Deprecated. 
Creates a buffer for the given owner. The new buffer will be initialized with the contents of the owner if and only if it was not already initialized by the factory (a buffer is uninitialized if its content is null).

Parameters:
owner - the owner of the buffer
Returns:
the newly created buffer
See Also:
IBuffer
